articles.description: Chelsea manager Enzo Maresca criticises the decision to stage the Club World Cup in the US following a two-hour weather delay during their win over Benfica.
articles.title: Club World Cup: Chelsea manager Enzo Maresca questions US hosting tournament

articles.description: England Under-21s were hidden by the tickertape as they lifted the Euro 2025 trophy. Now they must ensure they do not disappear again.
articles.title: England U21s win Euro 2025 - but who could make the World Cup?

articles.description: Follow live text and listen to BBC local radio commentaries from day one of the latest round of the 2025 County Championship.
articles.title: County Championship LIVE: Day one - scores, radio commentary & live text

articles.description: YouTuber-turned-boxer Jake Paul outpoints 39-year-old former middleweight champion Julio Cesar Chavez Jr, who barely throws a punch in the early rounds.
articles.title: Jake Paul vs Julio Cesar Chavez Jr: Paul claims unanimous points win

articles.description: British and Irish Lions centre Sione Tuipulotu laughs off the jibes of the Perth stadium announcer and heaps praise on Garry Ringrose and Finn Russell.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions 2025: Sione Tuipulotu close to his best again

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says Ferrari's second and fourth places on the grid at the Austrian Grand Prix were a "fantastic result".
articles.title: Austrian Grand Prix: Lewis Hamilton says Ferrari's qualifying performance 'fantastic result'

articles.description: Jurgen Klopp believes the Club World Cup is "the worst idea ever implemented in football" because of "serious fears" over player welfare.
articles.title: Club World Cup: Jurgen Klopp says Fifa tournament is football's 'worst idea ever'

articles.description: Jonathan Rowe has gone from walking out as a nine-year-old mascot alongside England and Brazil at Wembley to scoring the winner in the Under-21 Euros final.
articles.title: Jonathan Rowe: From England mascot to England Under 21s matchwinner

articles.description: World number one Luke Humphries defeats fellow Englishman Nathan Aspinall 8-6 in the final of the US Darts Masters in New York.
articles.title: US Darts Masters: Luke Humphries beats Nathan Aspinall 8-6 in final

articles.description: Former England and Northamptonshire batter Wayne Larkins dies at the age of 71.
articles.title: Wayne Larkins: Former England and Northamptonshire batter dies aged 71
